evidence.claim: KoKo PFT utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards in handling health information.
Integration of EDI protocols to streamline healthcare billing processes is part of KoKo PFT's service offerings.
KoKo PFT implements FHIR standards for data interoperability in healthcare solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data management with EDI integration and HIPAA compliance.
